thread.section_title: SimplyOz.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SimplyOz.com | simplyoz.com
thread.title: Sylvia John

author: Sylvia John
title: Sylvia John
text: I have ordered from Simply oz many times and i am overall happy with the customer service and food. However I have just spent a generous amount of money on my last shipment. One of the items (dissatisfaction) tasted stale and had to be thrown out. This is unacceptable. I expressed my disappointment to Simply Oz. I have not received any response except to fill out a survey. Thanks
